basics.name: Clément Goubier
basics.label: Back-end Developer
basics.summary: Back-end Developer with extensive experience in developing and maintaining scalable applications for various industries, utilizing PHP, Symfony, React and other modern technologies.

work.name: Display Interactive
work.description: Empower airlines to embrace innovative in-flight digital strategies with UGO, an IFE engagement solution !
work.summary: Develop and maintain websites, back-office systems, and onboard solutions for airline clients. Collaborated with international teams to ensure high-quality project delivery, applied agile principles, and implemented processes to maintain consistent code quality.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained websites and back-office systems tailored for airline clients.
Installed and configured onboard software solutions for aviation clients.
Conducted on-site testing and wrote detailed specifications with clients across multiple regions.
Contributed to the evolution and maintenance of existing projects.
Implemented processes to ensure consistent code quality.
Organized sprints and followed agile principles to manage project development effectively.
achievements: Successfully deployed onboard solutions for multiple airline clients.
Established a robust framework for maintaining consistent code quality across projects.
Improved client satisfaction by delivering tailored solutions and conducting thorough on-site testing and requirement gathering.

work.name: Webcentric
work.description: A digital agency in Paris building solutions for companies !
work.summary: Developed and maintained high-load websites, back-office systems, and mobile applications for B2B clients across diverse industries such as manufacturing and events. Delivered projects within 3 to 6 months using modern web technologies and agile methodologies to ensure high-quality outcomes.
responsibilities: Developed websites, back-office systems, and mobile applications for B2B clients.
Tested and deployed code to ensure functionality and reliability.
Contributed to the maintenance and evolution of existing projects.
Implemented processes to maintain consistent code quality.
Organized sprints and applied agile principles to improve project delivery.
achievements: Successfully delivered high-load web applications for clients in various industries.
Streamlined development processes to ensure consistent code quality.
Improved project delivery timelines by adopting agile methodologies.

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.
highlights: Built with React and Tailwind CSS
Includes a blog and contact form

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A web application that provides weather information for any location.
highlights: Built with JavaScript and OpenWeatherMap API

projects.name: Task Manager
projects.description: A simple task management app to keep track of daily tasks.

projects.name: E-commerce Site
projects.description: An online store built with Next.js and Stripe for payment processing.
highlights: Product management and shopping cart functionality
